summary: Analyzed .claude/ system structure and categorized ~70% as reusable core components and ~30% as Lean-specific. Identified architecture patterns (thin wrapper skills, forked subagent pattern, checkpoint execution) and designed a layered approach for stock Neovim system: Core Base + Neovim Domain Context + Neovim-specific agents/skills.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report with component categorization, architecture analysis, proposed Neovim system design, and 7-task implementation plan (14-21 hours estimated)
